scripts.build:cdk: npm run build:lambdafunction && npm run build:lambdalayer
scripts.build:lambdafunction: rm -rf dist/app/ && mkdir -p dist/app/conf-file/ && cp -a conf/ dist/app/conf-file/ && npm install && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:lambdalayer: rm -rf dist/lambda-layer/ && mkdir -p dist/lambda-layer/nodejs/ && cp package.json dist/lambda-layer/nodejs/ && cp package-lock.json dist/lambda-layer/nodejs/ && npm --prefix dist/lambda-layer/nodejs/ install --production
